name: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action

extract.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

files.game: N/A: Please select the VA-11 HALL-A PROTOTYPE .tar.bz2 install file downloaded from https://sukebangames.itch.io/va11proto

content:
custom-name: VA-11 HALL-A PROTOTYPE
files:
- game: 'N/A: Please select the VA-11 HALL-A PROTOTYPE .tar.bz2 install file downloaded
    from https://sukebangames.itch.io/va11proto'
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/VA-11_Hall_A.sh
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: game
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/VA-11_Hall_A.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-x86_64/VA-11_Hall_A
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/lib/linux-i686/VA-11_Hall_A
require-binaries: tar
